message.body: Susanna I would like to use some cello music in a project I am working on. Would you like to work with me? It would be minimal commitment, I don't think u have to write anything just let me consult you about cello music, but your contribution would be integral... You would be a collaborator.
yea sure! sounds great. can't wait to hear more about it.
:) i'vve been wanting to work with you for a while
